lead_paragraph: The fight between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao on May 2 will be the richest boxing match in history with the purse totaling more than $200 million dollars. A look at the rising paydays for boxers over the years.
snippet: The fight between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao on May 2 will be the richest boxing match in history with the purse totaling more than $200 million dollars. A look at the rising paydays for boxers over the years.
